---
title: "Apple Stock Price"
format: html
---

```{r setup}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
```

## Load CSV

```{r}
df <- read_csv("data/stock_prices.csv")
```

## Fix Excel date column

```{r}
df$date <- as.Date(df$date, origin = "1899-12-30")
```

## Filter Apple

```{r}
aapl <- df %>% filter(ticker == "AAPL")
```

## Plot closing price

```{r}
ggplot(aapl, aes(x = date, y = close)) +
  geom_line(color = "steelblue", linewidth = 1) +
  labs(
    title = "Apple (AAPL) Closing Price",
    x = "Date",
    y = "USD"
  ) +
  theme_minimal()
```
